snippet: “The Amazing Spider-Man 2” — starring Andrew Garfield and Emma Stone, and already a hit overseas — had an impressive, if not spectacular, opening weekend in North America.
abstract: Movie The Amazing Spider-Man 2 brings in $92 million during its opening weekend at box office, validating sizable gamble by maker Sony Pictures Entertainment; movie had estimated production and global marketing costs of $400 million, making it most expensive movie among 2014 summer blockbusters.
lead_paragraph: “The Amazing Spider-Man 2” — starring Andrew Garfield and Emma Stone, and already a hit overseas — had an impressive, if not spectacular, opening weekend in North America.

headline.seo: ‘Amazing Spider-Man 2’ Makes $92 Million in North America
headline.main: Not Quite Amazing, but Spidey Does Swing
headline.print_headline: Not Quite Amazing, but Spidey Does Swing
